items.headline: ‘I’m confused!’ Why does President Trump want a rate cut so badly?

items.headline: Adyen shares plunge as company warns on impact of ‘de minimis’ shipping rule change
items.summary_en: Adyen, one of Europe’s few growth stocks, saw its shares slump on Thursday as the Dutch payment services company is set to feel the impact of new tariff rules be applied to low-cost goods.

items.headline: Former NBA star Zach Randolph sells L.A. trophy estate for $7.4 million, after several price cuts
items.summary_en: Retired Grizzlies star Zach Randolph has finally offloaded his sprawling L.A. home for $7.4 million—11 months after listing it for $8.5 million.

items.headline: The biggest winners of the Taylor Swift-Travis Kelce podcast

items.headline: Bitcoin extends rally, hits record high above $124,000
items.summary_en: The Trump administration’s looser regulatory stance and the wider adoption by institutional investors, including the approval of crypto ETFs, have been a boon to bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.

items.headline: Cisco’s growing AI demand sparks earnings beat, but the stock is falling

items.headline: Taylor Swift’s last record made up more than 6% of all album sales in 2024. Will ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ do even better?
